section.subtitle: Transform your financial institution with AI call agents that handle customer inquiries, loan applications, and account services 24/7 - while ensuring ADCB compliance and CBE regulatory standards.
key_benefits: Handle account inquiries & balance checks automatically
Provide bilingual Arabic & English banking support
Ensure UAE Central Bank compliance & security
Never lose potential customers to competitors

voice_demo.title: Live Banking Inquiry Demo
voice_demo.description: Real conversation with AI agent handling UAE banking customer service
voice_demo.transcript:
Customer: Hello, I'd like to inquire about opening a business account for my new Dubai company.

AI Agent: Good afternoon! I'd be happy to help you with opening a business account. May I start by getting your trade license number and the nature of your business?

Customer: Sure, it's license number 789456123 and we're in the technology consultancy sector.

AI Agent: Perfect! For technology consultancy, we have excellent business banking packages. You'll need your trade license, memorandum of association, and passport copies. I can schedule an appointment with our business banking specialist tomorrow at 10 AM or 2 PM. Which works better for you?

Customer: 10 AM would be ideal. What documents should I bring?

AI Agent: Excellent! I've scheduled your appointment for tomorrow at 10 AM at our DIFC branch. I'm sending you a detailed checklist via SMS and email. Our specialist will guide you through our competitive rates and digital banking solutions. See you tomorrow!

metadata.target_audience: UAE banks, financial institutions, investment firms, insurance companies
